projects.title: Food Order App
projects.bodyText:
- Includes custom hooks, a combination of Redux and context API, and different components
 -  Utilises Firebase cloud storage to store received orders from users.
 - Features to be added soon: user authentication, Multiple SPA with the help of router, QR functions integration

projects.title: Idolit -  Social Media App
projects.bodyText:
- Social Media App For Talented Individuals developed with SwiftUI as a start-up.
 - Users can share posts + view their followers posts in their feed and interact with them with likes and comments.
 - Added User authentication using **Firebase**.
 - Utilizes Firestore for storing users' media.

projects.title: Life-Planner
projects.bodyText:
-  Work-life essentials are integrated into one web application.
 - Built to decrease the time wasted in switching between apps.
 -  Developed with React + Bootstrap and Jquery.

projects.title: Book recommendation algorithm
projects.bodyText:
- An algorithm that recommends books to users based on questions prompted them.
 - The algorithm uses previous users ratings and based on similarities recommends a book.
 - Developed with python
